definitions.title: subst.
definitions.body: c. [[ה]] loc., used as exclam. lit. ad profanum! i.e. far be it (for me, thee, etc.) ! (v. Ba:NB 136)—´[[ח]] Ge 44:7 + 17 t., [[חָלִלָת]] Ge 18:25 b + 2 t.—alone, 1Sa 14:45, 1Sa 20:2; elsewh. c. [[לְ]] pers.: Ge 18:25 b (J), 1Sa 2:30, 1Sa 20:9, 1Sa 22:15; + [[מִן]] and inf. of act deprecated Ge 18:25 a, Ge 44:7, Ge 44:17 (all J), Jos 24:16 (E), 1Sa 12:23, 2Sa 23:17; + [[מִמֶּגּנּל]] (peculiarly) Jos 22:29 (P; = from it, even to rebel); + [[אִם]] (= surely not) 2Sa 20:20 (´[[ח]] ´[[ח]]), Job 27:5; strengthened idiom. by [[מיהוה]], ´[[לִי מִיּ]]´[[ח]] sq. [[מִן]] and inf. 1Sa 26:11, 1Ki 21:3 + 2Sa 23:17 (rd. [[מיהוה]], LXXL SyrVer Targum) = 1Ch 11:19 ([[מאלהי]]) sq. [[אִם]] 1Sa 24:7; [[לָאֵל מֵרֶשַׁע]] ´[[ה]] Job 34:10.
